 USignal (int signum, ccallback_type handler, void *arg=0)
int signum () const

Detailed Description

template<>
class USignal< ccallback_type >

This is the specialization of USignal for C-style callbacks.

Note:
This event always EV_PERSIST.
See also:
USignal
